feed.title: Yoon Group
feed.subtitle: Harnessing Computation and AI for Materials Design in Energy and Sustainability

entry.title: The Yoon Group is now officially open!

link.title: The Yoon Group is now officially open!

entry.content: The Yoon Group is now officially open in the Department of Chemistry and Biochemistry and Materials Science and Engineering at Baylor University! We are thrilled to welcome Dr. Shedrack Akpe (Postdoc) and Wasihun Dagnaw (PhD Student) to the team. Looking forward to the groundbreaking research they will contribute to! Stay tuned for updates on our work in computational materials, sustainability, and energy research.

entry.title: Hello world!
entry.content: Welcome to the Yoon Group! Our group will open in the Department of Chemistry and Biochemistry and Materials Science and Engineering at Baylor University in January 2025.
